channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 16:51 Air anxiety in the Kherson region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 16:51 Air anxiety in the Kherson region follow the following messages.#Kherson_Blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:00 Free evacuations without significant rainfall, light rain in the afternoon. At night and in the morning fog, visibility 200 - 500 meters. South wind, 3 - 8 m/s. Air temperature at night 6 - 8 춿 heat, in the afternoon 15 - 17 춿.
item.description: 游 14:00 Free evacuations without significant rainfall, light rain in the afternoon. At night and in the morning fog, visibility 200 - 500 meters. South wind, 3 - 8 m/s. Air temperature at night 6 - 8 춿 heat, in the afternoon 15 - 17 춿. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
